scripts.build:docker: npm-run-all --parallel --print-label build-docker:bot-auth-service build-docker:bot-service build-docker:game-service build-docker:rpc-service build-docker:web-service
scripts.build-docker:bot-auth-service: docker build --build-arg PNPM_SCOPE=@binglow --build-arg SERVICE_NAME=bot-auth-service --target bot-auth-service -t binglow-bot-auth-service .
scripts.build-docker:bot-service: docker build --build-arg PNPM_SCOPE=@binglow --build-arg SERVICE_NAME=bot-service --target bot-service -t binglow-bot-service .
scripts.build-docker:game-service: docker build --build-arg PNPM_SCOPE=@binglow --build-arg SERVICE_NAME=game-service --target game-service -t binglow-game-service .
scripts.build-docker:rpc-service: docker build --build-arg PNPM_SCOPE=@binglow --build-arg SERVICE_NAME=rpc-service --target rpc-service -t binglow-rpc-service .
scripts.build-docker:web-service: docker build --build-arg PNPM_SCOPE=@binglow --build-arg SERVICE_NAME=web-service --target web-service -t binglow-web-service .
